title: JavafloatKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about JavafloatKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
float myNum = 5.75f;
System.out.println(myNum);

Definition and Usage
The
float
keyword is a data type that can store fractional numbers from 3.4e−038 to 3.4e+038.
Note that you should end the value with an "f":
Related Pages
Read more about data types in our
Java Data Types Tutorial
.

★
+1
